    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:SDK125_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>SDK125_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Water and human health</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser und menschliche Gesundheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau et santé humaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água e saúde humana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua e salute umana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ και ανθρώπινη υγεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua y salud humana</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Water is a natural resource that is vital for human survival and health, although only a tiny fraction of the Earth's supply is available to humans and terrestrial animals. In this unit we look at threats, such as pollution, to water's capacity to support life around the world.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Bioaccumulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Cholera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Climate_change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Contamination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">diarrhoeal_disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">toxicology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">water_cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser ist Naturresourcen, die für menschliches 
Überleben und Gesundheit lebenswichtig ist, obgleich nur ein kleiner 
Bruch des Zubehör der Masse für Menschen und terrestrische Tiere 
vorhanden ist. In dieser Maßeinheit betrachten wir Drohungen, 
wie Verunreinigung, zur Kapazität des Wassers, das Leben um die Welt 
zu unterstützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau est une ressource naturelle qui est 
essentielle pour la survie et la santé humaines, bien que seulement 
une fraction minuscule de l'offre de la terre soit disponible aux 
humains et aux animaux terrestres. Dans cette unité nous 
regardons des menaces, telles que la pollution, à la capacité de 
l'eau de supporter la vie autour du monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A água é um recurso natural que seja vital para
a sobrevivência e a saúde humanas, embora somente uma fração 
minúscula da fonte da terra esteja disponível aos seres humanos e 
aos animais terrestrial. Nesta unidade nós olhamos ameaças, 
tais como a poluição, à capacidade da água suportar a vida em 
torno do mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'acqua è lle risorse naturali che sono vitali 
per la sopravvivenza e la salute umane, anche se soltanto una frazione
molto piccola del rifornimento della terra è disponibile agli esseri 
umani ed agli animali terrestri. In questa unità guardiamo le 
minacce, quale inquinamento, a capacità dell'acqua di sostenere la 
vita intorno al mondo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ύδωρ είναι ένα φυσικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που 
είναι ζωτικής σημασίας για την ανθρώπινες επιβίωση και την 
υγεία, αν και μόνο ένα μικροσκοπικό μέρος του γήινου 
ανεφοδιασμού είναι διαθέσιμο στους ανθρώπους και τα επίγεια ζώα.
Σε αυτήν την μονάδα εξετάζουμε τις απειλές, όπως η 
ρύπανση, στην ικανότητα του ύδατος να υποστηρίξει η ζωή σε όλο 
τον κόσμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El agua es un recurso natural que es vital para 
la supervivencia y la salud humanas, aunque solamente una fracción 
minúscula de la fuente de la tierra está disponible para los seres 
humanos y los animales terrestres. En esta unidad miramos 
amenazas, tales como contaminación, a la capacidad del agua de 
utilizar vida alrededor del mundo.</string>
          </description>
